column5: Romantic Hill Country Getaway  This beautiful and private 2/2 home rests on 1.5 acres in lovely Lago Vista and includes all the amenities to make your extended stay or weekend-getaway memorable. Wake up every morning to a view of Lake Travis and the gorgeous hill country of North Austin. Cook a leisurely breakfast in the fully equipped kitchen including a large granite island in an open floor plan. Next, take advantage of your private lake parks, boat docks, community pool, and golf course.
